New Records: Trevor Williams lowered his ERA to 2.03, a Nats’ record
Pre-Game Insights: MacKenzie Gore takes the mound, and hopefully as MacK the knife. The shark needs to show his teeth to cut through the Phillies and finish his season with more promise.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Stone Garrett went 3-4 with a walk and a triple-shy of a cycle. It was an emotional time, and at the same time uplifting.
Others: The Nats need to go 2-0 to surpass their 2023 win total and that is a big ask. Win one game and the Nats would tie the 71-win mark from 2023. The Nats are big underdogs today at +170 to win on the moneyline. That means if you bet $100 you would win $170. Bet $10.00 and you win $17.00. Dave Martinez had the big lead and that gave him the opportunity to rest his “A” bullpen.
Radio: 106.7 The Fan radio and via the MLB app; In Spanish on DC 87.7 FM and La Pantera 100.7 FM/1220 AM. On Sirius/XM, tune to Channel 180 for the home broadcast and the road team is online only.
